original_title: 野村萬斎×シェイクスピア～密着・５０歳にして挑む新たな「マクベス」
overview: The programme closely follows the birth of a new 'Macbeth' and his journey around Shakespeare. Kyogen actor Nomura Mansai and Shakespeare, and the similarities between them, are explained in an easy-to-understand way, and we come into contact with the art created by the two talents who have fused together over a long period of time.
title: 野村萬斎×シェイクスピア～密着・５０歳にして挑む新たな「マクベス」
